revised_title: Enhancing or Retarding Temper Embrittlement in Alloy Steels: Compositional Factors
tldr: This article discusses the compositional factors that can enhance or retard temper embrittlement in alloy steels. It explores the effects of residual elements, additives, and material properties on the embrittlement process. The authors suggest that understanding these factors can help improve the properties of alloy steels.
